sentences.sContent: Of course you also need others' understanding, conciliation and support. But even at this moment, you're so silent, so peaceful, so stouthearted and so respectable!
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course you also need others' understanding, conciliation and support. But even at this moment, you're so silent, so peaceful, so stouthearted and so respectable!
sentences.sCn: 你又何尝不需要他人的理解、抚慰和支持，而这时你却是如此沉默、恬静、刚毅而令人肃然起敬！

sentences.sContent: So we women should be strong like iron when we work, look ourselves as men, decidedly, manfully, stouthearted The idiosyncracy we appear in the work should be like this.
sentences.sContent_eng: So we women should be strong like iron when we work, look ourselves as men, decidedly, manfully, stouthearted The idiosyncracy we appear in the work should be like this.
sentences.sCn: 所有女人在工作中要像钢铁一样坚强，把自己当成男人，果断，刚毅。这就是我们工作中该呈现出的特质。

remMethod.val: stout(勇敢的， 坚决的)+heart(心)+ed → 刚毅的， 大胆的
